transcript:
Customer: [Music]

Hello?

Hello?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hello? Mujhe awaaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan aa rahi hai, bataye.
Customer: Priom Priom baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kal baat hui thi humari.

Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji Priom baat kar raha hu kal baat hui thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan bataye.
Executive: Wo ho gaya hai kya kehte hai aapka mail wo issue clear ho gaya hai?
Customer: Ji actually wo mail jo hai maine delete kiya baki sari ye ki to hua nahi to aapne bataya tha ki nayi mail primary me kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To maine nayi mail id bana li.
Executive: Naya naya mail add kar diya hai aapne? Naya banaya hai ya pehle se hi tha?
Customer: Nahi banaya hai, tha nahi. Company ke naam se hi kya mail banaya hai ye @ se banaya hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hello Aaj Yogi Prakash.
Executive: Haan to matlab ye dikha raha hai na kya kehte hai verify?
Customer: Haan haan ye verify.
Executive: Haan to dekhiye mail se kuch issue hota nahi hai ya to humne matlab apne uska portal ka alag se le rakha ho matlab corporate corporate mail ek hota hai jisme beech me piche @ karke apni company ke naam me kuch likha rehta hai to ye to @gmail.com hai na to matlab naya mail bana lijiye ya purana dal dijiye usse kuch fark padta nahi hai. Aapne ye mail update kar diya aapke notifications wagera us mail par aa rahe the to wo us par aane lagenge. To isse kuch fark padega nahi aisa jo buyleads wagera aa rahi thi jab koi bhi aapka mail dekhega to company ka naam hi waha par dikhta hai hai na?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai to ye matlab issue solve hai ab hai na aapko koi dikkat to nahi hai?
Customer: Haan haan ye issue to solve hai.
Executive: Thik hai. To abhi is issue ko leke leke hamare paas ticket open tha usko close kar deta hu thik hai aap jo call kiya tha aapne customer care pe to hamare paas ticket open ho jata hai hai na ki wo problem hai to problem jab solve ho jati hai to hum use close kar dete hai to abhi mai isko close kar deta hu thik hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan close kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan aapke is par mail par jo aapne naya update kiya hai na is par closer mail jayega ki humne ticket close kar diya to us par feedback jata hai ki aapka wo issue solve hua hai ki nahi satisfied ho unsatisfied to aap wo de dijiyega please.
Customer: Haan thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Accha waise aap unke liye Vikram ji ke liye service dekhte hai ya matlab aap kya karte hai matlab unke liye?
Customer: Haan mai ye customer ki leads hoti hai mai hi manage karta hu.
Executive: Accha to aapke bhai wagera hai ya matlab aap unke liye job karte hai?
Customer: Bhai hu mai unka.
Executive: Accha accha. To dusra number aap hi ka updated hai ya dusre number pe koi aur executive hai dusra jo number hai hamare paas?
Customer: Wo mere matlab wo bhi bhaiya hai.
Executive: Haan wo bhi dekhte hai?
Customer: Wo bhi dekhte hai hum teeno log dekhte hai.
Executive: Accha to main hai jo matlab wo Vikram ji hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Accha. Thik hai service thik chal rahi hai conversion wagera ho rahe hai leads wagera thik aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi leads to bilkul bhi thik nahi hai inter locking ki to bahut kam lead aa rahi hai. Aur lead aati bhi hai to bahut dur dur ki aati hai nearby jaise Lucknow, Kanpur, Allahabad ki bahut kam lead aati hai.
Executive: Interlocking main product hai baki stone gitti wagera hai ye cement wagera hai inme lead inme kam karte ho ya inme requirement kam hai aapko?
Customer: Inme requirement hamari kam hai hamara main purpose hai interlocking fly ash brick aur parking tiles.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Main aapka interlocking hai hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Samajh gaya interlocking ke aati hai pehle bhi ye wala issue mujhe bata chuke hai to matlab kabhi kabhi requirement kam hoti hai to kam show karta hai hai na to aap tab tak aur tarah ki leads me apna business wagera karte rahiye kyuki agar leads matlab agar wo available nahi hai to aisa nahi ki ye wali leads hi hum na le in leads ko use karke apna jo hai activity karte rahiye aur in se apna kuch business nikal dijiye baki interlocking agar aise nahi aati to search karke aap check karte ho?
Customer: Haan mai check karta hu but jaise dur dur ki dikhati hai na Rajasthan, Jaipur, Udisha aur kabhi kabhi to aisa hota hai ki lead dikhayegi Prayagraj ki aur wo lead rehti hai kahi aur ki dusre shahar ki abhi mai ek din check kiya to ek lead thi Kanpur ki aur bataye ki mai Udisha se baat kar raha hu Bhuvaneshwar.
Executive: Aapne bola tha unko ki address to aap Kanpur show kar raha tha?
Customer: Haan haan to bole nahi mujhe mai Bhuvaneshwar se baat kar rahi hu koi lead.
Executive: Kabhi kabhi GST address le leta hai aisa jo system hota hai na ab unka man lijiye kisi ke GST yaha ki Kanpur ki to waha ka address le liya abhi wo business apna Udisha kar rahe hai us tarike se kabhi kabhi wo thodi si misunderstanding ho jati hai details me. Kabhi kabhi hota hai wo har lead me nahi hota hai waise.
Customer: Haan abhi jaise Gorakhpur me hamari lead bahut dher sari waha pe fly ash brick chahiye tha to distance price jyada hai is wajah se issue aa raha hai agar nearby
Customer: To abhi yaha ropeway ban raha hai to yaha koi bhi lead hamare paas bahut rare lead aati hai Varanasi ki.
Executive: Accha waise overall agar dekha jaye to ye aath mahine nau mahine service almost ho gayi hai humne kitne matlab customer crack kiye honge kitne deal convert hui hongi hamari?
Customer: Haan kafi ki hai aisa nahi hai. Ek minute. Issue ye hai ki jo aas paas ki leads hai wo bhi hamare paas aaye to behtar hai.
Customer: Jaise mujhe pata chala ki bhaiya mere ek do parso hi gaye the Monday Monday ko Varanasi me the wo.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To waha pe ropeway ka kaam ho raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Waha fly ash bricks hi use ho rahi hai but uske regarding hamare paas koi lead ya fir kuch aisa.
Executive: Lead tab aati hai jab wo khud requirement apne post karte hai aap un wo jab apni requirement dalenge na IndiaMART par tab wo buylead banegi.

Hello?
Customer: Ji ji samajh raha hu.
Executive: Hai na? Thik hai ji leads se mai dekho ek baar dekh leta hu interlocking ke agar mai kuch keywords add kar sakta hu to mai isme add kar deta hu thik hai jo bhi related keyword hai aapke jisse aapka iska thoda leads ka flow ban jaye thik hai baki ye wala ticket mai close kar deta hu uska feedback aap de dijiyega thik hai aur ek ek issue matlab issue kya hai ye aapko mai bata raha hu jaise kabhi kabhi hota hai na koi lead aati hai hum teen log matlab dono bhaiya aur mere paas teeno log ke paas ye hai IndiaMART phone me.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To hum log kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai ki jaise hi wo lead purchase karne jate hai to instant aaya message purchase karne gaye wo lead expire already.
Executive: Wo lead expire ho jati hai is lead ko na limited number of people consume kar sakte hai man lijiye ek lead post hui to usko jab paanch che log purchase kar lete hai to wo lead expire ho jati hai iska kya reason hai jitne jyada logo agar aap dete hai to wo customer jaise wo lead requirement dali wo bhi pareshan ho jayega aur aap us contact karoge na to aapko bhi accha positive response nahi milega us pe to aur kabhi kabhi na wo seconds me sold out ho jati hai matlab aap sahi keh rahe ho ki aate hi sold out ho jati hai kyuki hamare paas aur bhi subjects aati hai ye wali isi kisi lead me na bahut jyada high competition rehta hai jo high sold impacts hote hai matlab in categories me matlab koi lead bahut acchi badi aapne dekha hoga jo badi leads hoti hai matlab jinme acchi khasi order value hogi wo aise jaldi sold out hoti hongi sahi keh raha hu?
Customer: Aur mai ek cheez dekh raha tha tender ki aa rahi thi to tender ko hum kaise jaise pass karwa sakte hai tender milta hai na ki aapko yaha ka tender de diya ja raha hai iski responsibility aapki hai.
Executive: Tender ki information usi me rehti hai aap tender purchase karte ho thik hai tender hoga jaise same buylead purchase karte ho waise same tender aap purchase karoge purchase karoge tender to uske andar sari information de rakhi hoti hai kis cheez ka tender hai kya unki requirement hai waha pe link rehta hai us link pe click karoge na to wo google pe google ke through us website pe le jayega jaha se wo tender post hua hai thik hai matlab jis company ne jis organization ne wo tender post kara hai to waha par aapko redirect kar dega waha par aapko sari jankari mil jayegi aapko form fill karna padta hai to wo aapko contact karte hai thik hai is tarike se tender matlab aap participate kar sakte ho jaruri nahi ki wo tender aap hi ko mil jaye aap usme participate kar sakte ho agar wo unko matlab aapse baat chit wagera karenge jo bhi hoga process agar aap unki requirement matlab fulfill kar sakte ho unke according to wo tender aapko mil jata hai is tarike se hota hai matlab.
Customer: Haan nahi ji aisa bhi hota hai tender hai to but usme bhi wo log charges add kar dete hai ki aapko itne 10000 20000 payment karne hai aur uske baad tender final nahi hua to aapka refund amount hoga.
Executive: Haan uski participate karne ki fees rehti hai usme jo bhi charge mangte honge wo aur agar wo tender aapko mil jata hai to thik hai nahi milta to wo amount refund ho jata hai ye ek tarike ka process hota hai uska.
Customer: Haan haan kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai.
Customer: Haan thik hai baki mai iska feedback aapko keh raha hu aap please ticket close kar dijiye wo solve ho gaya thik hai.
Executive: Okay okay. Thank you so much.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's mail issue was not resolved.

- Interlocking leads are very less.

- Leads are from far away locations.

- Facing issue while purchasing leads.

- Enquired about tender process.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the customer about mail update.

- Executive said he will add keywords for interlocking.

- Executive explained about tender process.

- Executive closed the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, interlocking, tender, refund, feedback
